00138             function                select_for_creator( $uid , $Start = false , $Limit = false , $CampaignId = false )
00139             {
00140                   try
00141                   {
00142                         $uid = $this->Security->get( $uid , 'integer_list' );

00145                         {
00146                               $Start = $this->Security->get( $Start , 'integer' );

00152                         {

00154                         }

00159                                     "umx_ad_banner.campaign_id$AddCondition".$Limitation
